## Create new slide with `##`

```md
## This is a slide title

And here's the slide content

## This is the next slide title

Plus some more content
```

. . .

<br>

Slide titles become your **URL slug** (unique portion of URL) and **navigation menu title** (click on the hamburger, bottom left!).

## Apply styles using Sass & CSS

Update the appearance of your slides by linking a stylesheet in your YAML: 

```yaml
---
title: "Quarto for Data Science Slides (and beyond)"
subtitle: "UC Love Data Week 2025"
format: 
  revealjs:
    theme: my-styles.scss
---
```

. . . 

Import Google Fonts, define [Sass variables used by Reveal themes](https://quarto.org/docs/presentations/revealjs/themes.html#sass-variables){target="_blank"}
